overview: A/V feedback, signal generation, CCTV, For-A,  DAC filters, sweep oscillators, video mixer, radio signal disruption, and reel-to-reel playback/ manipulation. The sounding of the visual and visa versa in real-time. The central element of this work focuses on communication disruption. Sometimes audible, the play of call and response becomes a push and pull with the signal itself.
title: Helios Electro
